names.english: lu family decoction for patchy baldness
names.commonEnglish: Lu Family Decoction for Patchy Baldness

actions: Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood.
With Bai Shao, regulates and harmonizes Qi and Blood.
With Shu Di Huang, for Heat symptoms due to Yin Deficiency and Devastated Blood.
With Bai Shao, Shu Di Huang and Chuan Xiong, for Blood Deficiency or Blood Stasis.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat and cools the Blood.
Nourishes the Blood, astringes Yin and calms Liver Yang.
With Dang Gui, nourishes Yin and Blood
With Dang Gui and Shu Di Huang, for dizziness, blurred vision, and dysmenorrhea due to Blood Deficiency or Stasis.
Invigorates the Blood, promotes the movement of Qi and expels Wind.
With Dang Gui, harmonizes, nourishes and invigorates the Blood and disperses Blood Stasis.
Nourishes Jing and Blood and Liver and Kidney Yin.
With Dang Gui, Bai Shao and Chuan Xiong, for anemia.
Invigorates and nourishes the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat and soothes irritability.
Tonifies the Liver and Kidneys, nourishes the Blood and Jing and expels Wind from the skin by nourishing the Blood.
Tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang.
With Rou Cong Rong, tonifies Yang without injuring Yin.
Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens the Yang and benefits Jing and marrow.
Nourishes and tonifies Liver and Kidney Yin and clears Deficiency Heat.
Tonifies the Blood and enriches Yin.
Releases the Exterior, disperses Cold and guides Qi to the Tai Yang and Du channels.
Releases the Exterior, expels Wind, vents rashes and relieves itching.
With Dang Gui and Chuan Xiong, for itching from Wind due to Blood Deficiency.
Nourishes Yin and Blood
Clears Deficient Heat

symptoms: Alopecia occurs over the vertex or at the lateral frontal areas
Often affects people in their twenties and thirties
The scalp is frequently greasy or itchy with dandruff
Achy and uncomfortable flesh and bones of the hands and feet
Recurrent fever with night sweats or hemoptysis
